meanings.definition: The state or quality of being loopy.
meanings.sent2: His loopinesses always brightened up the room.
meanings.sent3: The teacher couldn't help but smile at the student's loopinesses during class.
meanings.sent4: The loopinesses of the clown brought joy to the children's faces.
meanings.sent5: The loopinesses of the puppy was contagious, spreading happiness to all.

meanings.definition: The tendency to behave in a silly or eccentric manner.
meanings.sent1: The comedian's loopinesses entertained the audience for hours.
meanings.sent2: Sometimes, a bit of loopinesses can make life more fun.
meanings.sent3: His loopinesses at the party had everyone in stitches.
meanings.sent4: The loopinesses of the artist's mind created masterpieces beyond imagination.
meanings.sent5: Her loopinesses was endearing, making her friends cherish every moment with her.
